## Source: khulnasoft-package-analysis (2000e5722263da2e4f4f1fd3372f3bb9fabed46406587cc6a9b1bd10aae8fd28)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'snap-kit-react-native' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
